data.title: Nick Dunn on LinkedIn: NBCUniversal Media Village
data.meta_description:
Big day for MSNBC and the NBC News Group Events strategy. 
Very exciting news. 

https://lnkd.in/ecQ2p-UR
data.text:
Calling all students (and parents of students!!!!) in 🏙 New York Metro, 🏛 Washington DC, ☀ Los Angeles, and 🏝Miami! 🚨🚨 It’s the FINAL week to apply for our Academic Year 2024-2025 NBCU News Group internships! 🚨🚨 Interns will be immersed in exciting work, experience our unique NBCU culture, and get real support & guidance for 2 semesters. This unique opportunity balances an unforgettable internship with academic coursework to help turn media & entertainment dreams into a reality! Check out the postings below and apply TODAY! #InternAtNBCU 📍 New York, NY ▪ NBC News Production Internship - https://smrtr.io/j_bZm ▪ NBC News Digital Editorial Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dSm ▪ MSNBC Production Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dSk ▪ CNBC Production & Editorial Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dTS ▪ NBCU News Group Communication, Marketing, and Research Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dRt ▪ NBC News Creative & Design Internship - https://smrtr.io/j_kNW ▪ NBCU News Group Technology Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dQF 📍 Englewood Cliffs, NJ (shuttle provided from NYC) ▪ CNBC Production & Editorial Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dSt ▪ NBCU News Group Communication, Marketing, and Research Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dRT ▪ NBCU News Group Technology Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dQ_ 📍 Washington DC ▪ NBC News Bureau Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_bR7 ▪ CNBC Production & Editorial Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_dTk 📍 Universal City, CA ▪ NBC News Bureau Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_bRr 📍 Miami, FL ▪ NBC News Bureau Internships - https://smrtr.io/j_bXf

What an AMAZING line-up!! CNBC's inaugural #CNBCChangemakers Summit: Women Transforming Business. To learn more about the event and register to attend, please visit: https://lnkd.in/eAq2cd_Z Featuring: U.S. Department of Commerce's Gina Raimondo Drew Barrymore Fannie Mae's Priscilla Almodovar rePurpose Global's Svanika Balasubramanian National Women's Soccer League (NWSL)'s Jessica Berman Amalgamated Bank's Priscilla Sims Brown Sigma Lithium Corp. (Nasdaq:SGML)'s Ana Cabral Upwards Jessica Chang WNBA (Women's National Basketball Association)'s Cathy Engelbert Bobbie's Laura Modi Room to Read's Geetha Murali Baby2Baby's Kelly Sawyer Patricof & Norah Weinstein Zoetis Kristin Peck Maven's Kate Ryder Sponsored by ServiceNow Acura The Coca-Cola Company 21Seeds Infused Tequila To learn more about CNBC Events, attending, speaking or sponsoring, go to: www.cnbcevents.com/. To join the conversation, use #CNBCChangemakers.

Excited to announce the return of Game Plan Summit! Sept 10 in Los Angeles. Once again - CNBC & Boardroom teaming up to convene leaders, visionaries and game changers from sports, business, entertainment and beyond. Apply to attend at https://lnkd.in/eaMJyZYA And watch Rich Kleiman on Squawk Box this morning with Joe Kernen, Becky Quick & Andrew Ross Sorkin! https://lnkd.in/eRz_M56i

Very excited for this amazing CNBC Events line-up for 2024. If you want to attend, speak at or sponsor any of our events - please head over to our website, CNBCevents.com. CNBC Events #leadership #innovation #management #technology #creativity #marketing
